item.title: Sled Help :D
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/285723-pi-working-sled.html

[QUOTE=Seba]Ugh well Flame all you want. I know there are a few people out there that dont know how to get the sled to work.

In CombatAssistant.java
find:

if(weaponName.contains("dharok")) {

Add above that

if(weaponName.contains("sled")) { c.playerStandIndex = 1461; c.playerWalkIndex = 1468; c.playerRunIndex = 1467; return; }

Save and compile. Congrats you got working sleds.[/QUOTE]

Edit: btw, I seriously searched “PI working sled” and got that.

Read full topic
